body.p:
Hustonville KY Nov 23. '63
To His Excellency
T. E. Bramlette
Frankfort
Ky
Dear Sir

Permit us as old friends to recommend to your consideration for a commission under the call of twenty thousand for the service of the state of Kentucky, Walker H. Bell -- We ask this as a favor to us -- and assure you that he will faithfully discharge the trust confided to him and is capable of so doing -- having had service in the 19th Ky Reg. Ky Infy --

R B Cain
G. C. Riffe
Geo Drye

I concur in the petition
J F Bell
W R Onar
William Goodloe
Jno. W. Shelly

Refered to Adjt Genl I understand that Harvey Cruill recommendation S. A. Miller as Lt in his Battery -- Miller belongs to 2nd it is against our fixed rule to appoint citizens of other States to command
